      void spawnBoss(Room room)
      Spawns a boss in a given room On odd levels spawns a scaled variant of a normal enemy On multiples of 6 spawns the mentor boss On multiples of 4 spawns the shotgun boss On multiples of 2 spawns the plant boss
      void spawnEnemies(Room room)
      Spawns enemies in a given room Spawns enemies based on difficulty values, each enemy has a difficulty value A random enemy is chosen and if the difficulty is below the max, the enemy's difficulty is subtracted from the counter Spawns a champion if the random roll is below the champion chance
      void spawnShop(Room room)
      Spawns a shop with items and shopkeeper
      void update(float dt)
      Updates each entity and checks collision if the game is not paused each dt

      • spawnEnemies

        public void spawnEnemies(Room room)
        Spawns enemies in a given room Spawns enemies based on difficulty values, each enemy has a difficulty value A random enemy is chosen and if the difficulty is below the max, the enemy's difficulty is subtracted from the counter Spawns a champion if the random roll is below the champion chance
        Parameters:
        room - room to spawn enemies in

      • spawnBoss

        public void spawnBoss(Room room)
        Spawns a boss in a given room On odd levels spawns a scaled variant of a normal enemy On multiples of 6 spawns the mentor boss On multiples of 4 spawns the shotgun boss On multiples of 2 spawns the plant boss
        Parameters:
        room - room to place boss in

      • spawnShop

        public void spawnShop(Room room)

      • setRoomDiscovery

        public void setRoomDiscovery(int x,
                             int y,
                             boolean full)
        Sets if the room has been discovered
        Parameters:
        x - x value of room to be discovered
        y - y value of room to be discovered
        full - ends recursive calls if false

      • setRoomDiscovery

        public void setRoomDiscovery(int id,
                             boolean full)
        Sets if the room with given id has been discovered
        Parameters:
        id - id of room
        full - false to end recursive calls
